customhtml2.customHTML:
Introducing the AltraFWD Experience, an all-new running experience.

Our first low drop shoe complements rocker shape geometry to deliver an effortless feeling with Altra’s signature Natural Fit. Featuring an all-new lightweight midsole foam and impeccable style.
Shop Women
Shop Men

Drop, Rock & Roll

The same natural fit you’ll find in all Altra shoes but with a 4mm drop. Yup, you read that right! This low drop encourages natural foot position while complementing rocker shape geometry for an efficient toe-off. When these two features combine, you’ll experience an effortless run and a smooth, quick roll through your stride.
Shop Women
Shop Men

LIGHTWEIGHT
Performance

A sleek engineered mesh upper and brand-new lightweight and responsive compression-molded midsole foam combine for the perfect blend of comfort, style, and performance.

Natural Fit

A roomy toe box for comfort and performance lets your toes spread out and encourages a natural stride, so you can move the way you were designed to.

Natural Fit

A roomy toe box for comfort and performance lets your toes spread out and encourages a natural stride, so you can move the way you were designed to.

Shop Men
